Description:
Family Appeal!
A prime opportunity now exists to acquire this wonderful family home! Neatly presented, it comprises 3 carpeted bedrooms with built-in-robes, bathroom with separate shower and bath and 2 living zones. A large oak kitchen appointed with wraparound bench, dishwasher, 90cm gas stove and breakfast bar flows through to a fantastic undercover entertainment area with adjoining games room. With downlights, new carpets, ceiling fans, split system inverter and inbuilt gas heater, every modern comfort is included! A secure lock-up double garage and tidy garden complete this residence. Representing outstanding value, inspection a must!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 50 Kingsley Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
What More Could You Want!?
Situated in a fantastic part of Corio within walking distance to schools, shops & public transport is this beautifully presented family home. Completed renovated with all of the extras you can move in and unpack without lifting a finger! 3 generous-sized bedrooms all with ceiling fans, a central & spacious updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard space plus a beautifully renovated bathroom with a separate shower and bath. Ducted heating and cooling. Outside is a huge covered outdoor entertaining area for all-year-round entertaining, a large private backyard for children to play in and a extra large garage with A/C cooling and space for 3 cars that has access from the street. Set on a corner block with rear access surrounded by quality and stylish colorbond fencing, this property will not last long so make your move today! Within minutes from the Geelong Ring Rd for Melbourne and surf coast commuters and just around the corner from the Princes Hwy for access to Geelongs CBD.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Attention Investors & Downsizers
Here's a rare chance to secure a stand alone unit with a great lock up yard for those with pets or young children.
Located in the fast growing Cloverdale Estate, you will enjoy good access to Ring Road, public transport and all amenities of the the area, with a new Aldi to open nearby.
The low maintenance unit is solid brick, easy care and would be an excellent rental due to this. Entering through a bright covered patio area to open plan living with excellent kitchen including dishwasher and good bench space and a dining/meals area all with great natural light. 2 large bedrooms share the generous updated bathroom. The single remote garage enjoys access to rear courtyard.
Securley fenced yard for pets and peace of mind. Take action quickly as this one won't last.

Description:
Centrally located investment property.
The creative and innovative buyer will appreciate the freedom to renovate and transform this property into a stylish home that suits their needs. Situated right on one of the major roads in Corio take advantage today of this exceptional investment opportunity or ideal first home in a terrific location! Just a moments' walk to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, public transport, sporting facilities & short drive to the Ring Road this home provides it all right at your front door. Set on a generous allotment of 642m2 (approx.) sits this great 3 bedroom home bursting with boundless possibilities. This home provides a spacious lounge at the front of the property with central gas heater. 3 comfortable sized bedrooms are located off the main hallway while the practical kitchen provides gas upright stove and views of the backyard. Towards the rear of the house you'll find the bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. Outside provides an extensive backyard perfect to entertain friends and family with single car garage and carport. Property with potential like this won't last long, you better be quick! - currently tenanted till 2018.

Description:
Ideal first home, investors dream or downsizers delight.
You won't be disappointed with the stunning renovation or proportions of this immaculate property on a 298m2 Approx allotment. A spacious open plan family room area leads to the well equipped and updated kitchen, complete with plenty of cupboard space and gas cooking. Three bedrooms all offer BIRs and a newly renovated bathroom centrally located with a bath, shower and modern single round basin. The laundry and separate toilet are located to the rear of the home and all amenities and desirable locations are near, such as schools, parks and public transport. The Corio Shopping Centre is only a five minute walk and Geelong's CBD just five minutes drive. No matter what your reason is for purchasing a home this property has it all for owner occupiers and investors alike. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
Close to Everything For Next To Nothing!
Perfect for investors, first home buyers or anyone simply wanting to downsize this near-new brick veneer unit is ready to move straight into. Superbly located within very close proximity to the Corio Village Shopping Centre and all that the area has to offer but you will need to be quick. Consisting of 2 well-proportioned bedrooms with BIRs, the open plan design offers kitchen with island bench, stainless steel gas appliances and dishwasher, large lounge/dining area with split system air-conditioner and ducted gas heating throughout. Large single car garage with remote control roller door and direct internal access. Currently rented to first class tenants at $290.00 per week until April 2017.

Description:
Beautifully updated on 764m2.
The innovative and successful buyer will appreciate this fully updated home on a 764m2 block. Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or investment that boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway close by. The home is freshly carpeted and painted comprising of a sizable lounge upon entry with gas heating, the 3 bedrooms all with BIR's are located off the main hall, nearby the large bathroom containing a single vanity as well as separate bath and shower. Positioned to the rear of the property the kitchen includes upright gas stove and plenty of space for a dining area. The rear yard provides plenty of open grass space and a 2 car garage including a workshop. Brilliantly located in close proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre, numerous schools for all ages, easily accessible public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD. Property with potential like this won't last long, you better be quick!

A rare opportunity to find such value when you consider Corio Central Shopping Centre is within 500 metres, schools even closer and leisure Centre and medical centres are even closer again. Description:
600m2 (approx.) & in a great location.
Prime positioning in a quiet neighbourhood, take advantage of this incredible opportunity to purchase this 3 bedroom home sitting on a generous 600m2 parcel of land - Zoned Residential Growth Zone, Schedule 2. With an extensive rear yard providing potential for sub-division (STCA), this home provides 3 ample sized bedrooms, a generous living area that allows for plenty of natural light, fully renovated bathroom, separate laundry & toilet, kitchen and separate meals area. Outside you have a single car garage with workshop, separate shed for storage and more than enough room for the family to enjoy. If you're looking for a first home, an investment or you're a renovator looking for a project that requires a little love and care but possesses the opportunity for fantastic financial growth then look no further! Five minutes' walk to the Corio Shopping centre with schools for all ages located just a short stroll away & public transport easily accessible, what more could you want?

Description:
3 bedroom brick veneer home in Cloverdale Estate.
Nestled in the heart of Cloverdale Estate in a quiet court location lies this charming 3 bedroom brick veneer home with ample living spaces for the whole family to enjoy. Whether you're searching for a neat investment opportunity or family home this property is sure to tick a lot of boxes. Comprising of a spacious lounge upon entry which opens to the dining area that provides direct access to the centrally located kitchen. The kitchen itself offers a large bench that overlooks the generous family lounge while 2 bedrooms both with BIR's are located at the rear of the property. The master suite provides WIR and is serviced by the large bathroom that acts as an ensuite by containing 2-way-access. Situated on a 530m2 approx. allotment outside features a paved undercover alfresco area, garden shed and rear access to the double garage which provides secure off street parking. This is an ideal opportunity to purchase a tidy property with public transport available just around the corner, easy access to Corio Shopping Centre and further major amenities such as schools, Ring Road and multiple reserves. Homes with this much potential do not last long, please enquire to ensure you don't miss out.
Insights: 1 Cathcart Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Just like new.
This vibrant & well maintained property provides an excellent investment opportunity for those looking to get a foot hold in the current property market. This tastefully designed 3 bedroom home will certainly capture your attention with its updates & light filled rooms. With the spacious living area at the front & bedrooms (2 with BIR's) off to one side, spotless kitchen with abundance in storage, a gleaming central bathroom with separate toilet & a practical laundry completes this exquisite property. Situated on an impressive 594m2 approx. allotment with ample parking space in the driveway & a backyard offering a paved undercover alfresco at the back door while still allowing plenty of space for children or pets to enjoy. Just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, schools for all ages, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!

Description:
Purchase now while it is still affordable
The suburb of Corio has increased in value at a higher rate than most other suburbs in the Geelong region and predictions are that due the highly affordable base prices available this growth is due to continue. Situated on this 607m2 (approx) allotment with development potential (STCA) this neatly presented three bedroom home with renovated kitchen and bathroom and living area is ready to either move into or let at around $230 per week. The large allotment also features a workshop/storage garage at the rear and parking for a couple of vehicles off-street. Located close to Corio Village, transport and sporting grounds the decision is easy. Don’t delay.

Description:
Perfect home or investment!
Whether you're looking for a great family home or to grow your investment portfolio, this custom brick home ticks all the boxes! Check out this list of features!
- 3 spacious bedrooms, all with built-in robes
- 2 living spaces
- Updated kitchen with breakfast bar
- Brand new carpets
- Hardwood floorboards
- Freshly painted
- Sunken lounge with fireplace & split system
- Central heating
- Timber lined ceiling
- Skylight pouring light into the living areas
- Off street parking for 4 cars
- Seconds to the ring road and only 10mins to Geelong CBD
- Amazing tenant with lease to March 2018
Stop reading, start calling!
